title: Copier

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you are alive, you gain one charge of all abilities used on any Mafia member (excluding abilities used by other Mafia members). You can gain repeat charges.
- You may use one ability per three charges you have.
- If you die, all charges left are randomly and instantaneously used on other players. This can negatively affect the Mafia.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose the Mafia.
